org.jetel.data

Class RingRecordBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.RingRecordBuffer

  • public class RingRecordBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    This record buffer implement FIFO record storage with limited number of records. If buffer is full, pushing next data record is going to result in the oldest data record to be removed from the buffer. None of the main record manipulating methods (push/pop) is blocking. Instances of RingRecordBuffer are not safe for use by multiple threads! Usage scenario: contructor(record_buffer_size) init() push/pop(Record) - multiple times reset push/pop(Record) - multiple times free()

        internalBufferSize - size of internal byte buffer

    • Method Detail

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Returns:
        true if the buffer is full, i.e. pushing another data record is going to result in the oldest data record to be removed from the buffer, false otherwise

      • init

        public void init()
          throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Basic record buffer initialization. It is necessary to invoke this method right once before first usage.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • pushRecord

        public void pushRecord(DataRecord record)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Push a record into the buffer. It is non-blocking operation. If the record buffer is already full, the oldest record is picked up from the buffer.
        Parameters:
        record -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
